# Copilot instructions (Codie)

This project uses **Azure DevOps**. Always check whether the **Azure DevOps MCP server** has a tool relevant to the request.

When implementing Azure DevOps work items:

- Prefer **Copilot Chat Agent Mode**.
- Use the **ado** MCP server to pull the latest work item details.
  - Follow the process in `.github/agents/codie.implementation.agent.md`.
